idea: “Tapd”, TFI Connect’s flagship brand, is aimed at being a central network of healthcare professionals in India. Further, with TAPD's free clinic automation offering, each of the Independent Medical Practitioners (IMPs) can connect to each other instantly and at no cost.
name: TFI CONNECT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Our Services

Recruitment Agencies : Being one the reputed HR companies, Indian Employment Agency. is well known for providing effective Manpower Recruitment Services to the clients. With highly efficient staff we ensure that the client organizations get effective solution for their manpower need on a timely basis.

HR Solutions : “Third party management providing the best people, process and technology for the execution of non-core business functions”. “A contractual relationship where an external organization takes responsibility for performing all or part of an agency’s functions. This can involve a partial or complete transfer of staff and/or resources”.

Overseas Placement : We have provided potential professionals to many companies situated overseas. We deal in many industries and can immediately find the right candidates for your organization for various profiles. We are a Mumbai-based recruitment agency with more than ten years of experience and offer excellent Overseas Recruitment services.

Manpower Services : Located in Mumbai, India, Indian Employment Agency is a leading company providing reliable services such as Manpower Recruitment, Head Hunting and Executive Search. All our operations are effectively handled under the guidance and supervision of our Director,Vinod Kumar Shyamnath Pandey. Indian Employment Agency started in 2021, with a track record of 100% growth year this year, since inception. Indian Employment agency caters to the needs of enthusiastic professionals in shaping their career and partnering with valuable clients in identifying Manpower resources, in India and overseas.
name: INDIAN EMPLOYMENT AGENCY

idea:

name: Trumac

idea:
We have been in the sports infra business for a long time . Some of our clients are in the business of educational institutions. We came to know that they required educational toys every year. For teaching the math & science their age group from 3 years to 12 years.

All the state governments also bought huge quantities under the scheme of SARVA SHIKSHA ABHIYAN.

80%to 90% products were imported from China under the brand name of USA, EUROPE & CHINA.

The Government of India has launched a big drive MAKE IN INDIA. Under this scheme they first imposed the import custom duty from 20% to 60% and made it mandatory to pass through inspection channel BIS (bureau of indian standard) due to higher cost of the petroleum products the freight cost became just double.

These steps taken by the central government are very much favourable to save the domestic SME sector.

Mr SB GIRI is an engineer & having 36 years experience in the industry

The family have decided to go for startup in the educational toys segment under the proprietorship of Miss maya giri
name: BAIJNATH
